meanings: a pilgrim to the Holy Land

examples.korean: Muslim pilgrims on their way to Mecca 발음듣기 메카로 향하고 있는 이슬람교 순례자들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Muslim pilgrims on their way to Mecca 발음

examples.korean: Christian pilgrims visiting Lourdes 발음듣기 루르드를 찾는 기독교 순례자들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
The steps had been worn away by the feet of thousands of pilgrims. 발음듣기 그 계단들은 수천 명의 순례자들의 발에 닳아서 반들반들해져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The steps had been worn away by the feet of thousands of pilgrims. 발음

examples.korean: Hundreds of pilgrims gathered in Jerusalem. 발음듣기 수백 명의 순례자들이 예루살렘에 모였다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Hundreds of pilgrims gathered in Jerusalem. 발음

examples.korean: The pilgrims prostrated themselves before the altar. 발음듣기 순례자들은 제단 앞에 몸을 엎드렸다 Neungyule
examples.english: The pilgrims prostrated themselves before the altar. 발음
